#summary This wiki describe the Domain dataset on the Desktop Tool

= Domain =

The figure shows Search Tab using the PFAM as main dataset.

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/48.jpg

In this dataset the quick search will be performed over the *PFAM ACC* (PF00248) and *PFAM Id* (Aldo_ket_red) fields including the use of [http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.0/en/pattern-matching.html SQL regular expressions].

On this !DataSet you are able to use other biological objects as [Constrains Constrains]. The available !DataSet to be used as constrains are: Protein.

The [SearchTab Search Tab] will produce a new [ListTab List Tab], next figure, with the obtained results.

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/49.jpg

The PFAM entry complete description window

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/50.jpg

In the !ComboBox the *PFAM's* linked info are be showed.
